name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】『EVERMORE』 Ninomae Ina'nis Birthday Live 2025  #EvermoreLIVE [I-J11Da5ONY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Ninomae Ina'nis performs the song 'Wasureji no Kotonoha' in a lush green field.
Transition into the performance of 'Suzume' by the door in the field.
Ina transitions through the door and changes into her white outfit.
Performance of 'Suzume' continues in a town square setting.

subtitles.original: 狂い迷って　やがて戯れて
subtitles.english: Wandering in madness, eventually frolicking,

subtitles.original: 幾千に組み　幾億の旋律となる
subtitles.english: combining in thousands, becoming a melody of hundreds of millions.

subtitles.original: いつか失い　奪われて消える定めでも
subtitles.english: Even if it is a fate that will one day be lost, stolen and vanished,

subtitles.original: それは忘れられることなき物語
subtitles.english: it is a story that can never be forgotten.

subtitles.original: 君の中にある赤と青の線
subtitles.english: The red and blue lines inside you,

subtitles.original: それらが結ばれるのは心の臓
subtitles.english: they connect at the heart.

subtitles.original: 風の中でも負けないような声で
subtitles.english: With a voice that won't lose even to the wind,

subtitles.original: 届ける言葉を今は育ててる
subtitles.english: I'm nurturing the words to deliver now.

subtitles.original: 時は枕木
subtitles.english: Time is a crosstie,

subtitles.original: 風は二肌
subtitles.english: wind is soft skin,

subtitles.original: 星は産土
subtitles.english: stars are the guardian deities,

subtitles.original: 人は陽炎
subtitles.english: people are heat haze.

subtitles.original: なんで泣いてるの　と聞かれ答えれる
subtitles.english: Asked why I'm crying, I can answer,

subtitles.original: 涙なんかじゃ　僕ら出会えたことの意味にはまるで
subtitles.english: with just tears, it doesn't at all catch up to the meaning of our meeting,

subtitles.original: 追いつかない　この身一つじゃ足りない叫び
subtitles.english: a scream that isn't enough with just this one body.

subtitles.original: 君の手に触れた時にだけ震えた心があったよ
subtitles.english: There was a heart that only trembled when it touched your hand.

subtitles.original: 意味を幾つ越えれば　僕らは辿り着けるのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder how many meanings we must cross to arrive.

subtitles.original: 愚かさでいい　醜さでいい
subtitles.english: Foolishness is fine, ugliness is fine,

subtitles.original: 正しさのその先で　君と手を取りたい
subtitles.english: beyond righteousness, I want to take your hand.

subtitles.original: なんで泣いてるの　と聞かれ答えれる
subtitles.english: Asked why I'm crying, I can answer,

subtitles.original: 涙なんかじゃ　僕ら出会えたことの意味にはまるで
subtitles.english: with just tears, it doesn't at all catch up to the meaning of our meeting,

subtitles.original: 追いつかない　この身一つじゃ足りない叫び
subtitles.english: a scream that isn't enough with just this one body.

subtitles.original: 君の手に触れた時にだけ震えた心があったよ
subtitles.english: There was a heart that only trembled when it touched your hand.

subtitles.original: 意味を幾つ越えれば　僕らは辿り着けるのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder how many meanings we must cross to arrive.

subtitles.original: 愚かさでいい　醜さでいい　正しさのその先で
subtitles.english: Foolishness is fine, ugliness is fine, beyond righteousness...
